title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted sourdough topped with smashed avocado, lemon, chili flakes and olive oil.

title: Beef Stir Fry
summary: Quick stir-fried beef with vegetables and a savory soy-ginger sauce.

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
summary: A colorful bowl of quinoa, roasted veg, chickpeas, and tahini dressing.
